name: Solun
description:
Solun is a first person atmospheric horror game where you play as Bryan, a 28 years old comedian.  

The protagonist lives a boring life, confined in his apartment, due to a worldwide pandemic.   

Strange events happen one day, leading to a psychological journey between reality and fiction.

Credits:

Gean Silva - Producer, Game Designer, Character Designer, Environment Designer, Composer

Gustavo Maldonado - Producer, Game Designer, Level Designer, Lead Programmer

Luíz Santos - Writer, Game Designer, Sound Designer, UI Designer

Marcos Engelhard - Game Designer, Programmer

Sofia Silva - Game Designer, Environment Designer, Level Designer, Sound Designer
